website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable Philips wake-up light that gently wakes you just like more expensive models.
pros: Sound of alarm gradually increases in volume
cons: No battery backup and no volume control for loud beeping alarm
Only one alarm can be set at a time

customer_reviews.title: BEEEP BEEEP BEEEP
customer_reviews.text: The soft light that slowly brightens the room to help wake you up so peacefully is overthrown with a giant BEEEP BEEEP BEEEP. The numbers on the display are a bright red, even at the lowest setting, which is a nice throwback to the 80s. The 4 buttons allow you to adjust the time via unplugging the clock. Setting the alarm is easy though. For the price, this thing should have some basic scheduling, and not have the functionality of a $5 hotel alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: CLTGUY

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of the older model Philips wake up lights in my house and they are great. One of my children wanted one too so I thought I'd give this newer model a try but, ugh, as I now see others have mentioned there's no volume control. You are forced to a loud annoying deet-deet-deet alarm! I should have read the reviews 1st! BTW, this model does not put out nearly as much light as the older models. I should have tried one of the cheaper non-Philips versions on Amazon (1/2 the price of this one) or gotten one of the older models. Stay away from this light!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A must for any struggling early riser!
customer_reviews.text: I wished I had found this say... 10 years ago?? Total game changer. I’m a 0500 peloton rider and it’s hard for me to get up without feeling totally pissed. The first night I used this light clock, I set it for 0450 but woke up at 0448 on my own... feeling totally refreshed and not pissed! For once; I was actually on time for my 0500 ride and felt fully awake when I got on my bike! If you’re a struggling early riser, get it now!
customer_reviews.author: worklifekids

customer_reviews.title: It works! It really works!
customer_reviews.text: After over 2 years on less than 5hrs sleep a night(child’s medical issues), we moved to a thickly wooded area. A friend who is a primary care physician suggested this lamp as they too have it. After 3 days the gains were remarkable, and after 2 weeks my sleep has regulated and I’m waking refreshed. I’ve been salvaged back to a functioning human. Initially I set it to the latest possible wake up time I can do without being late all day. Then I pulled it back 15mins every 3 days to get to where I should be.
customer_reviews.author: Donkey's Breath

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK for an entry-level sunrise alarm. One feature is a deal-breaker for me though.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an OK clock, though a bit cheap feeling very light-weight plastic. If that’s ok for you, I guess this is a nice one. However, I’m returning this because the clock display cannot be completely dimmed. I live in a rural northern area where the nights are long and completely dark. While I love the idea of a gradual sunrise simulation to wake naturally during long winter nights, the number display is annoying. Some reviewers suggest putting duct tape over the display but then I can’t see it to set the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sabatier

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much... it broke after a month.
customer_reviews.text: I loved loved loved this clock... for the month that it worked. I was so disappointed. The concert is amazing and it really helped wake me up in a more natural and gentle way... then it just stopped working and nothing i tried fixed it. It was rather expensive for a clock and i was very upset when it broke. I will look for a different brand of clock that does the same thing bc i really loved the concept and it woke me so perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Has a light and shows the time
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but this Philips Wake-Up light is lacking in features. The inability to change the annoying beep of the alarm to a more soothing rather than startling sound is a huge miss for Philips. The light does get very bright on the highest setting and the ability to decrease the brightness of the clock during the night is a great feature that is usually missing on an alarm clock. Haven't noticed the slow brightening of the light helping me wake up in the morning yet so it is mostly useful as a bedside lamp. Next time I will opt for one with a sunset feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great but for one thing....
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as expected except for the 'gentle beeping' - it is NOT GENTLE. It actually ruins the entire experience. I happened to have some thin sound-insulating foam pads I salvaged from a demo job. I cut a square and taped it over the speaker grill. Reduced the volume by maybe 25 - 33 % and this clock is now everything I hoped it would be. Really makes a huge difference in my life actually.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: No beeping please
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and would be great if you could just use the light. Unfortunately you're forced to also use the horrible beeping of the alarm with it. Useless to me at this point. Phillips, make it to where you can use the light functionality and turn the alarm off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying beeper!
customer_reviews.text: The product description says, "Imagine waking up easily and naturally, without having to be jolted awake with the noise of an alarm clock. Philips Wake-up Lights are designed to do just that." The problem is, this would jolt me awake with the noise of an alarm clock! Why? Because after the light gets bright, this starts beeping loudly in a terrible high-pitched shriek! Based on the product title and description I was expecting to be able to turn off the alarm sound and just have the light get brighter every morning. Apparently, that is not the case. This is a pretty expensive device if it doesn't provide simple options like that.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrel Haveman

customer_reviews.title: Good wake-up light, but wish for a little more "smarts" like alarm-free weekends
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a refurb/renewed unit. Works just as well as the genuine one, and this is the real deal, not cheap imitations. The light does brighten gradually before the allotted wakeup time, though the alarm doesn't graduate in loudness like the light. Also, it's not really possible to make the alarm not go off on weekends other than to turn the alarm off Friday night and turn it back on Sunday night, as the clock itself is about as dumb as it can be... It doesn't even know what weekday it is.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Reviews Romance and MoreTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Terrible alarm noise
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the WORST alarm sound in existence. It is a loud beeping noise that completely ruins the point of this alarm clock which is to wake up naturally from light. No option to turn it off unless you want to try to disassemble and remove the speaker on this unit. Otherwise this functions nicely as a bedside light and has good lighting options. However for the price you would think they would include volume control methods or removing the alarm sound.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Chiang

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to wake up in the morning.
customer_reviews.text: The increasing light level in the morning and the alarm sound are effective, and a nice way to wake up in the morning. The light helps me slowly wake up before the alarm even sounds so it's not... well... so alarming as some alarms can be. I also like that I can switch on the light anytime and use it for reading or lighting up a dark corner. The brightness on the clock display is adjustable, as is the light itself. I've also dropped this thing on the floor plenty of times and banged it around in a handful of moves, and it still works great, so A+ for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Falls off the night stand every time
customer_reviews.text: I guess this does what it is supposed to do..get light and beep..but I sleep right through the light...and hate the beep. When I tap the top to turn the beep off, the little slanted stand just topples over and the whole thing ends up on the floor. Why the tiny lightweight stand? And the instructions say not to look at the light. So..should it not be pointed at me? If it's not, the light isn't really enough to wake me up. I'll try another brand I guess.
customer_reviews.author: C. FIELD

customer_reviews.title: Cannot silence alarm without ending light
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of this is to gently wake you up with a sun simulation except that there’s an alarm that you can not disable that starts to shriek as the simulation starts and cannot be silenced without ending the simulation. Completely defeats the purpose of the light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I read into how this thing works and was skeptical. I bought it for my wife and she loves it. She says that she feels less groggy and sluggish in the morning and she wakes up at 430 am. Even when she is short on sleep for the night, it helps a lot to gently and slowly wake you up from deep sleep as opposed to a jarringly loud sound to wake you up. She likes her sleep and hates waking up early... This has made her mornings much much better.
customer_reviews.author: The Toan Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Not a pleasant noise!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this alarm will be nice and soft wake up device for my daughter. While it has pretty nice features as far as light, it does not have any sound features. On box it says gentle beep, but its not. Its actually pretty annoying. And I didn't see any option to change the theme or sound.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Gonchar

customer_reviews.title: Got to use two hands. gotta  wake up facing it
customer_reviews.text: It weighs so little that you can’t push a button without holding it with two hands and the light works but unless you’re facing it, it doesn’t wake you up and then you hear the annoying Alarm and that’s what I’m trying to avoid. So sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn’t depending on which way I’m facing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, wish I bought the more expensive one
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm with some problems that others have already have mentioned. First YES the light helps me wake up Pros: Light REALLY helps waking up (wish it was a little brighter) Touch to snooze is nice (though i've left it ringing all day since I didn't turn it off). Cons: Can't change the alarm sounds, which kinda sucks no battery backup.....meaning a power loss during the night = no wake up Overall though I still recommend it! That waking light really makes a difference especially now when there is no natural sun light coming in the morning (hint it's winter). I wish I'd have bought the more expensive one, just hate the normal alarm sound.
customer_reviews.author: Supermuncher

customer_reviews.title: Easy wake up
customer_reviews.text: Love this alarm. There are no windows in my bedroom and not having any natural light makes it hard for me to wake up. With this I am almost always awake and not groggy feeling before the alarm even goes off. I wish there was a battery backup for the clock so I didn't have to set it every time the kittens unplugged it.
customer_reviews.author: Tarina Martin

customer_reviews.title: Looooove this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish you could adjust the volume, but other than that, this thing is amazing! I set my alarm for 6:30, it starts turning on at 6 and then the alarm part goes off at 6:30 when it is fully lit. I struggle so much with daylight savings time as I always determine the time based on the sunlight in my room and this has been the perfect work around now that it is sooo flipping dark when I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Raab

customer_reviews.title: Beeping alarm can't be shut off
customer_reviews.text: The light gets extra bright quickly. To snooze, you tap the top of it, but it's not very steady so if you tap it off center, it gets knocked over. And hey, who's got great snoozing aim? Not me. The worst part is the beeping. You get one quiet double beep. About 2 seconds later it's a very loud, constant beeping. There is no way to turn the volume down or off.
customer_reviews.author: dragonflower

customer_reviews.title: Good product, a bit stubborn but still good.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I've been using it for over a year now and yes, it did take a bit to get used to but it is functional. I have had issues several times with the alarm just not going off in the morning. Sometimes its the light, sometimes its the sound and sometimes it just doesn't go off, which is now a problem for me because I've woken up late in several occasions due to this so I might switch to a different alarm clock. But that's my only issue. I like the light, I don't mind the loud beep, it helps. I like how light in weight it is.
customer_reviews.author: IzCast

customer_reviews.title: Brightens up my morning
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. it gradually gets brighter until the time you choose. I do wake up as it starts to get bright before my alarm but i like that i can sort of zone in and out for a few minutes before the alarm goes off. I would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Eustace

customer_reviews.title: the LIGHT stopped working after year later
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very cheap but it did the work for one year. In the beginning, the brightness light works fine but eventually the light slowly disappeared. Now a year later, the light doesn't work, it only shows the time and the alarm works. I bought this purposely for the "light" and paid so much money. If I wanted just the alarm clock, i would have bought a cheaper one for $5.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Sunny mornings!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Sun light. I suffer from insomnia and sometimes it's hard to wake up when you're finally sleeping well. I used to use my smart phone's alarm but there's nothing like waking up to a simulated sun rise. It feels KIND on my system! Your body really reacts to it naturally vs a jarring alarm noise. Well worth the cost. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Has a light- works...but not much better than a basic alarm clock with a light
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but is not easy to turn off when the alarm goes off. The buttons for light and sound are really small on the sides. No way to mount it or use batteries instead of a cord, which makes it almost useless for me, since I can't put it in a place I will be able to see the light in the morning. Very expensive for such a basic alarm clock (with a light).
customer_reviews.author: embsa

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a gift and she seems to like it quite a lot. The progressive light works very well. Very happy the clock display is dimmable as well. The one thing we don't like is we wish the alarm tone sound were adjustable for tone and volume. Otherwise, its a great size for a nightstand and works great. Its all plastic and is very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great for dark rooms and heavy sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: We sleep in a basement with no windows in our room. This helps me wake up SO much better than before. Waking up in a dark room is not fun because you just want to lay there and stay asleep. I love that it is a gradual "sunrise" because it helps you ease into the morning. I rarely make it to the actual alarm beeping now because my body is getting used to it. I will say the numbers on the display can be bright sometimes, but it has a dimmable feature. If it *really* bugs you... you could put a piece of electrical tape or something over it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Time display too bright!
customer_reviews.text: It really helps wake me up. I still need my alarm clock and I hit the snooze button a couple of times but I still get up faster and in a better mood. I am giving this a three star review because the digital time display in the center is so bright it can keep me awake. I don't know what they were thinking but it ruins the point of the system if I wake up in the middle of the night and I have to unplug it because the time is so bright. When they make one that has no light display until the wake up time it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jjm

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise it’s been working great for me
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with sleeping through alarms (I would hit the alarm without actually waking up), and I was surprised at how much of a difference having a light in the alarm clock helps. Numbers can be set to be extremely dim if needed (so dim you can even see it with a light on in the room) so I’m not sure why anyone was complaining about it in another review. I wish this alarm had a volume or sound type selection, but otherwise it’s been working great for me.
customer_reviews.author: H. Swaim

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright
customer_reviews.text: This item works very well, but I returned it becuase I thought that it would light up the entire room. You are supposed to put it next to you and it does wake you up gradually, but the light is yellow and I need more of a white light. Otherwise, it would make someone a really great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use wake up alarm
customer_reviews.text: This clock is much easier to operate than knock off brands, but has fewer options (in particular I liked the various color options of a cheaper one I purchased). That said it got the job done without confounding me on a daily basis on where to push the button to snooze or turn it off unlike the other ones. I also don't like the stand because it feels sort of unstable. My husband accidentally broke it, so not sure how durable it is, but it was definitely an accident thing and not shoddy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Kate the Great

customer_reviews.title: Light Gradient is fantastic... the attached alarm... not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pretty heavy sleeper and have relied on setting multiple alarms to wake up. I decided to try a different type of alarm clock and was pretty pleased with waking up to a light instead of the cacophony of rings/bells/whistles. This light alarm is almost perfect... but the sound/speaker is unadjustable and downright pretty annoying. I found a video online detailing how to silence the alarm (permanently) so instead of returning it, I've stabbed out the alarm functionality. My mornings have been nothing but blissful awakenings since. also a much cheaper alternative to the later versions that offer different alarm sounds/volumes.
customer_reviews.author: Animog

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm clock but get the more expensive one with more features if you can.
customer_reviews.text: Love this alarm clock. I was doubtful at first but it works great, I tend to wake before my alarm these days, if i have any complaints it it that its such a gentle awakening I don't have the adrenaline spike to get me out of bed when i used to get startled awake. I would recommend getting the more expensive version of this alarm clock. I bought this one as I was skeptical it would work and these alarm clocks are expensive but it does work and I wish I had the features of the more expensive one but I am too cheap to buy it while this one is still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Decent light alarm
customer_reviews.text: I am not that convinced yet but seems it is helping. would have loved to have the brightness little more for reading but I guess this is to avoid you from sleeping. I like the volume control options.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: So, so ... doesn't live up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: It says volume control under the review section but this item literally has no column control. I more so just wanted an alarm to wake up to without the annoying noise, it advised a soft beeping noise but there is nothing soft about that beeping. Also the digital features are really close together and the times is a bit hard to read at a glance, especially if you have an alarm set.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for me, and I wish I'd known about it years ago. The light starts at a low setting 30 minutes before the alarm is set to go off, so by the time the audible alarm rings I'm already starting to wake up. Which means no more being startled into throwing my alarm clock across the room. This may be one of the best purchases I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Morris

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I was skeptical because I’m not a morning person and absolutely detest waking up before sunrise. This thing is great and actually pleasant to wake up with. I haven’t felt the need to hit snooze a hundred times since I’ve had it. Despite what the other reviews say about the actual alarm itself, I don’t mind the beeping at all. Maybe it’s been changed since then? Idk. Anyway, I recommend this alarm clock. Do not regret spending the money for it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chrysanthemomma

customer_reviews.title: This is great for those dark mornings
customer_reviews.text: This is great for those dark mornings. I have trouble waking up under the best of conditions but when the mornings are pitch black it's even worse. I wish I could say that since using this alarm clock I am bouncing out of bed like a true morning person. That is not the case but it does help me to wake up a little more easily. And I wake up more gradually which is good for me. I do wish that there was a way to turn the alarm off and use just the light to wake me. I prefer to use the alarm on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock. I still do not necessarily get up when my alarm goes off, but I still feel better when I do get up with gradually increasing light. My only real complaint is how light weight the clock is. The slightest touch and it moves across the nightstand. Makes it really hard to push the alarm button on and off. Also makes me super worried about accidentally pulling or shoving it off the nightstand. Other than that, it is definitely a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Tara R.

customer_reviews.title: Why can't I disable the audio alarm and only use the light? Lame.
customer_reviews.text: I might return this thing. I really want to like it. But, c'mon...you can't disable the audio alarm. I just want the light, and I'll coordinate my own phone alarm with the light. This thing is way too expensive to not have an option to turn off the audio alarm. I get why they only offer a single alarm sound option--they're trying to upsell the features of the (very much) more expensive alarms. But, seriously, let me turn off the audio.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Paul

customer_reviews.title: I think I need to continue my search for a better device.
customer_reviews.text: All I've done so far is set it up because I accidentally shut off the alarm while testing it. As other people have noted setting isn't intuitive, so open the manual and read as you go. The 'gentle beep' startled me when I was expecting it. It's big, takes up a lot of space on my night stand and it's so light that I'm afraid I'm going to knock it to the floor (I'm not graceful when I'm wide awake). I've also notice that the price dropped $16 since I purchased it on Sunday (thanks Amazon!). As much as I need help waking in the morning, I think I need to continue my search for a better device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple operation, high quality, great price for what it does, great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described and appreciate the super simple operation. I also can't find the snooze so I just leave it on and set my phone alarm for 10 min after this goes off :) I'm also being lazy since didn't take the time to read the manual to try to find it - but I would expect that I could find a snooze button without having to look in the manual so that is a little disappointing. At this price point, it makes an awesome gift that most people probably wouldn't buy for themselves. I strive to provide useful reviews, so it this was helpful to you, please give my review a thumbs up :)
customer_reviews.author: High Expectations

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up, alarm sound is irritating
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful lamp, but the clock numbers are a bit hellish red in the middle of the night. Despite reading the user guide, it was still complicated to set up, has no battery back up (but I understood this when I ordered it), and even though I checked to see if the alarm was on, it still didn't go off (or increase in brightness). To be fair, the alarm sound is distressing, so I'm happy I missed it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little lighted alarm with only a few features, but this has some big drawbacks for me. First, the base is so unstable and lightweight that you can't press the buttons without grabbing it and hanging onto it so it doesn't topple over. Secondly, as a very light sleeper, I hate waking up to a classic beeping alarm. That's it has and you have no choice to shut it off and just use the sunrise light. Because of those two things, this is not a good choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: fitvegan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for waking you up during fall/winter mornings!
customer_reviews.text: This alarms makes it so much easier to wake up in the morning! Now that fall/winter are coming and it’s darker in the mornings, I wanted a sunlight alarm that would make it easier to wake up. This alarm wakes you up gently, like waking up off a soft cloud. The brightness is just right for me and I love the design. Very minimalist. 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.author: J.M. 757

customer_reviews.title: Saves my mornings
customer_reviews.text: This clock honestly makes my days so much better. I have to wake up when it is pitch black outside and this thing makes it seem like it's not crazy, crazy early. Other customers have complained about the volume, but for me, that's a plus in an alarm clock. If the sound isn't annoying already I'm going to be annoyed by it soon, so the beeping is not an issue. To give you an idea of how much i love this clock, I sometimes take it with me on long trips even though it is NOT shaped very well to fit into a suitcase. Definitely, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: It was just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to other viewers' comments, this light does not wake me up in the morning after using it as an alarm clock for a month now. I am generally sensitive to lights from window in the morning, and that wakes me up, but this light, no mater how I set it up (I tried to set it so directly looking over me...), I somehow find a way to hide my face or just simply not strong enough. Also time gets reset whenver unplugged, no volume change on beeps..etc. I considered returing it, but now that I am a month of use, I will just keep it as a pretty alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Blue turmeric

customer_reviews.title: OK but not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after having one of the older cylinder version we bought in 2012. This may have gotten a higher rating if the other version was not so much better. This one feels like they stripped out/changed features to up charge for other versions. There are not enough brightness levels (10v20) and there is not option for light only or something other than the horrible alarm sound. I would recommend the older model (Hf3470) if you can find it but this will do the trick. It is still better than a standard alarm for me but I am not sure the additional cost of the more expensive versions is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cdela

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this alarm clock/light in 2016 and in the beginning of 2019 it stopped working. I tried different adapters thinking it was the cord but no, the system failed. Additionally, the alarm clock noise is so loud is induces anxiety. I ended up setting the brightness level higher to wake me up well before the actual alarm noise to avoid this issue. If you are buying this because you are sensitive to sound - do not purchase this model. Also it breaks. Furthermore, there is no battery backup and the alarm clock will reset itself if there is any power surge or power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Dolby

customer_reviews.title: The lack of features is what hurts this product
customer_reviews.text: The alarm sound sucks, too loud and jarring for how good the light itself works. I'd like an option to have light only, and use my phone alarm to wake me. The fact that I can't have a light only mode is enough to knock a star off. But it works as advertised, and the light usually does wake me before the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: v giordano

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough wonderful things about this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock!! It always wakes me up gently and on time!!! I wake up best to natural light and even though this definitely doesn't replace a natural sunrise it still provides a nice wake-up glow. I don't miss the jolt of a regular alarm clock and I am also less likely to go immediately back to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Makes my whole day better
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp/alarm. I keep the brightness set on 10 so I can keep it across the room. Light starts turning on dimly 30 minutes before alarm. I usually wake feeling refreshed and ready to jump out of bed about 5 or 10 minutes before alarm sounds. I generally get an hour and half before natural sun-shine, so this has been wonderful for me. I also notice I am not tired on my drive to work in the dark after using this natural light alarm. Very happy with this product! I have been using this for about four months now.
customer_reviews.author: KathiWathi

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. I'm not a morning person and waking ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I'm not a morning person and waking up is still difficult even with this wake up light. From all the reviews and articles I read, I was expecting a bigger change to my wake up experience in the morning. It does improve it slightly by getting a light source on in the room, but overall, I'm still not waking up much easier. No fault of the product itself. It does everything as advertised. It's probably just an issue with my own ability to wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Ma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Use: Bedroom Alarm Pros: Ease of Use, Sun Simulator, Adjustable Brightness of Clock and Light, Lamp Use Cons: None I purchased this item because my phone alarm was not working for me anymore. I found these types of alarms with sun simulators in my search and purchased this product. Great buy. Highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My brother has one by Philips that Mom really liked. It played ocean sounds and such as the light brightened. this one did not and i thought the one i was looking at did. but this is a Philips and it don't play sounds, just has a noise. Sadly it works fine just not what i thought i was giving as a Christmas gift after all.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Lighting good, but only one alarm sound
customer_reviews.text: The sunrise simulation portion is good. I have to have mine set to Level 10 (highest level) in order for it actually wake me up. The alarm itself is only a buzzer. There is no option for other sounds. This is a good, basic sunrise alarm clock. If you want more variety, I'd recommend Phillips' more expensive version. I had that one prior to having to purchase this one when I moved overseas.
customer_reviews.author: Nergilicious

customer_reviews.title: Good clock/lamp, mediocre alarm
customer_reviews.text: The digital display, the lamp, and the construction itself are all great. My complaint is with the alarm Sound. There is no volume control for it and there is only one tone. Otherwise it's a nice clock/lamp, but the alarm part is a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. Huge disappointment. Only worked for a little while and then it started acting up. The light would turn on randomly or not at all. I never even moved it from the original spot. It never fell or anything so I don't know what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Angel S.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I really like this alarm clock. I am extremely light sensitive, and this has made waking up before sunrise MUCH easier for me. I like the fact that you can adjust the brightness of the light. The biggest challenge I have with it is that the base is slippery on my tabletop, so I feel like I need to coat it with rubber cement to keep it from sliding around whenever I try to hit the button to turn the alarm off.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Features are not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I will be sending this back. The product info is misleading but after trying the device, the audible “beep beep beep” part of the alarm cannot be shut off independently from the light.
customer_reviews.author: bellacarta

customer_reviews.title: I love this clock/light/alarm
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock/light/alarm. It wakes me up to my circadian rhythm and I wake up feeling so refreshed and light, versus getting up to the miserable alarm on my phone which I risk breaking every time it goes off. Plus, this doubles as a light and since it mimics natural lighting, I love using this as a lamp also. Great purchase, I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lightweight, poor user design
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set. Poor ergonomics, clock is literally difficult to hold onto when setting. Clock is extremely lightweight for the price and is easy to knock over. Does not take batteries. You could probably find a free app that does this for a lot less hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp if you need to get up before sunrise
customer_reviews.text: If you have to wake up before the sun rises or suffer from SAD, you must get this. I have to get up early and this lamp makes it so much easier. I could do away with the alarm and use my phone, but it really simulates the sunrise. Once it reaches its highest setting, I really feel like it’s bright out and get up and get my coffee. I like getting up half hour before I need to and have coffee in bed and this lamp achieves my goal.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh. This is the most glorious thing and I can’t believe it took me so many years to buy one. I startled really easily so a standard alarm is terrible and I start each morning with a jolt of adrenaline. This is the most peaceful way to wake up.
customer_reviews.author: laurenrenee

customer_reviews.title: This Alarm of Mine Glows With an Awesome Power, It Tells Me to Wake Up!
customer_reviews.text: I foolishly bought this alarm clock despite my head being next to a window; and not needing to wake up while its dark very often. The alarm clock is really hard to configure right; be sure to read the manual carefully to fully grasp what each button does. The alarm sound is fairly loud, and the light gets insanely bright - but for me, these things just felt flat of helping me wake up. Maybe its just my physiology, but if you live in a cave, or need to wake up at 5am, I could see this working wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Drakeling

customer_reviews.title: Best investment to get rid of the winter slump!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wake up light at the start of the winter to try and stave off the winter slump. I've been using it for the last several months and love it absolutely every day. It really does ease your waking up process, and I swear I wake up more rejuvenated than I did without it! The only thing I don't absolutely love about this product is that it's easy to forget to turn the alarm off for the next day. It stinks to get the early morning weekday wake up on a weekend. Be mindful to turn off the alarm on weekends, and I'm certain you'll love this as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: C. Anne Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm if you want sound and sunlight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for the light alarm and did not need the sound, I have not found a way to set the light to come on without the sound alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I work 2nd shift and found myself falling into the groove of wasting my entire morning falling in and out sleep. Once my normal alarm went off, I would have trouble actually staying awake and getting out of bed. Reading the reviews, these light alarm clocks seemed to be good, but I didn't realize they were THIS good. This is probably the cheapest model I would go with, but it does very well for the price. The light ramps up very slowly, over the course of 20 minutes or so, which is very soothing to not shock your body awake like normal alarms. Only complaint I have is that it's a little difficult to turn off the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock is absolutely awesome. I love the gradual brightening of the face, just like an actual sunrise. The display brightness is easily adjusted as it is quite bright in a dark room I would buy one again. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HighPockets

customer_reviews.title: Phillips Wake up Alarm clock- Best around
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clark does its job. It does just what the product information describes. No need to worry about not getting up on time, this alarm does the job. It is also a nice looking clock that looks good on the night stand. Recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Myhalyk

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you're facing it each morning
customer_reviews.text: This light works great, but it doesn't wake me up 'naturally' every morning like I had hoped. You do have to be facing it in order for it to be effective, which makes sense, but if you turn on your sides away from it when you're sleeping then there's a chance it won't wake you up. Like most other reviews, the fact that you can't disable the alarm is annoying. I did buy it knowing this ahead of time, but it's not the most pleasant sound to wake up to. I guess if the light wakes you up before the alarm, then it's not as much of a rude awakening.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Helps me not be Rip Van Winkle
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can adjust the max brightness for the clock. Also, the alarm starts of quiet and gets progressively louder. It gradually wakes you up, and isn’t abrupt. I still set my phone alarm and put it across the room to help me wake up because I’m a professional snoozer. I now wake up on the first alarm 4/5 days during the week. Much improved from setting my alarm 2 hours before I needed to wake up so I could hit snooze 10,000 times and not be late.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E Gronewold

customer_reviews.title: The red clock numbers never go away
customer_reviews.text: You're supposed to point this right at your head, but the clock numbers are so bright (even on the lowest bright setting). To me, having this red light pointed at you all night is a pain. I have to tilt it away from my head so I can sleep. So, it's not as effective as it would be if it were facing me. But, it still does a good job of helping me wake up in the early mornings of winter in the 45th parallel.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan E Winter

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews have stated
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews have stated, the snooze function is very difficult. The first morning, I was slamming the top of the alarm to get it to snooze- I have yet to get it to work. There is also not a volume button on the sound so it ended up waking my husband up to when i just need it to wake me up. Light feature was nice especially in these dark dark mornings now. Just wish snooze was easier because I end up turning it off so will still need alarm on my phone which is what I was trying to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Hate the alarm noise. Light is good.
customer_reviews.text: I hate the sound of the alarm noise. I stopped using this for that reason. The light gradually getting brighter is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Cat

customer_reviews.title: helps me wake up for work
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for almost a year and the light definitely helps me wake up for work and I'm definitely not a morning person. The beeping alarm is effective and I like that you can adjust the light brightness. I have noticed that over a long period, the clock started falling behind and I have to adjust it by a minute or two every few months. For the price, I wish it had a radio option in addition to the beeping alarm.
customer_reviews.author: giants68

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic when I purchased this alarm clock. I have had this now for several weeks and really like the way the light gradually increases. I usually wake up before the light processes finish and the sound alarm goes off. I feel more refreshed when I use this than when I use my phone alarm. I have recommended it to all my family and co-workers. I am very happy with this alarm!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgewater Oregon

customer_reviews.title: A different way to wake up
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely horrible in the morning - I struggle to wake up no matter how motivated or excited I am, it is still a struggle...this helped a lot...took the edge off...almost like waking up to ‘birds chirping’...nice suttle awakening...highly recomend this product to any and everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works great and worth the $40!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it is so incredible! I can actually wake up on time now. Mornings before this device used to be horrible. I feel so much more energetic when I have to wake up and it is still dark out. The light gradually gets brighter and can help me wake up way before the buzzer goes off. Save yourself some money. This device costs about $40 while the other wake-up light on this website can cost about $80. Both devices do the job well the only difference is if you want to hear bird sounds you have to spend an extra $40 to get a more modern device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Choose another model. Sadly I can't return or exchange this, or I'd upgrade it, but because it was a gift for my husband I t wasn't opened in time to return. Their Other more expensive models have the nature sounds, which was my intention. I had one for years from another maker and loved it. I even went with prime membership to buy their select models. This one the snooze does not work at all, it has that horrific alarm sound which defeats the entire purpose of waking naturally with Light and nature sounds. Disappointing. The light works but we've unplugged it due to the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome, except for the screeching alarm
customer_reviews.text: Changed my life. This thing is awesome, except for the screeching alarm. God, I wish I could turn off the audible alarm. Holy crap is it annoying. I'm considering damaging the internal speakers it's so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock, but it did absolutely nothing for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice clock, but it did absolutely nothing for me. That said, i'm a really heavy sleeper and kind of have a serious problem with mornings. I had high hopes for this, but I slept right through the light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Never late!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This is the PERFECT alarm for people who have trouble waking up in the morning when it is pitch black. 30 minutes before the alarm goes off, the alarm slowing starts getting brighter until it lights up the room as if its noon. The best part is when you wake up, the light is not a shock to your system, it feels completely natural! You can even set the brightness setting, in case it is too bright for you. My favorite feature is the ability to lower the brightness of the clock setting, you can set the clock to barely have any light so it won't bother you when trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Budweisman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. It works, in that it slowly gets brighter and ends with a beep to wake you up. But, for me, the brightness did not feel like a game changer. The room already gets some light in the morning, so this did not change that much. If you have a pitch black room, or perhaps during winter months, then perhaps this would have more of an effect. As is, it just didn't do much more than a standard alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Canales

customer_reviews.title: I was shocked when I awoke the first morning feeling great. So far
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit that I was a little skeptical about this product to begin with. I am a heavy sleeper, so I doubted that a light would wake me up feeling more refreshed. I was shocked when I awoke the first morning feeling great. So far, I have been using it for 4 months and I find it invaluable. I live in the North, so the sun isn't up for at least an hour after I get up. This light has helped me live through that time. I heartily recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Patrek

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the size of it and the fact that it's a constant light source
customer_reviews.text: I think that many of the people who bought this device are people who care about there sleep qulity. Those people usually try to cancel any light source inside their bedroom. However there isn't any cay to cancel the light of the time on this device. I would except a mode of not time show or total black. The device has to be on something near electricity source. It doesn't have any way to mount it into the wall. Be aware of the size of it before you buy. The Idea of light the room 15 minutes before the alarm sound start is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rimonh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The product seems very lightweight and cheap. It just doesn't seem like much for the price. A progressive brightening light connected to an alarm.. that's it. The manual doesn't provide much information at all, and it is not a very intuitive device to use (like figuring out how to turn the alarm off with one button press...) I've found that I start to wake up as soon as the initial brightness levels come on, so I haven't noticed much of a positive effect. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been my whole life?
customer_reviews.text: I'm a reluctant waker, and this light has been a treasure. The gently brightening light really does bring you to awareness gradually so that by the time the inevitable happens and the alarm sounds you're mostly ready. I can't sing the praises of it enough. If you've been on the fence about purchasing this light, do it now. Or wait until it's on sale. You'll wonder how you woke up before you got it.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Plenty

customer_reviews.title: I love this alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock! I had a little trouble setting it up at first but it's not too difficult. I use it in conjunction with my phone alarm because I have a difficult time getting up in the mornings. I noticed I tend to oversleep a lot more when I just use my phone alarm. The only issue I have is hitting the snooze "button", which is really a snooze area, can be hit or miss when you're groggy and slapping around in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Shab A.

customer_reviews.title: No such thing as dim on the backlight
customer_reviews.text: The panel that displays the time is super bright at night even on dim. It lit up our entire large master bedroom. I tried it one night and woke up halfway through the night to tape an piece of cardstock on it. It was not worth the trouble. I returned it and got a different brand with better features.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this buy! I’m sensitive to light (typically sleep with an eye mask) and the very low dim setting on the clock does not keep me awake at night. I’ve been waking up so much better in the morning with the natural feeling light, especially this winter when I see minimal sun outside.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to wake up, just needs a back up battery
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try a different way to wake up. It works well too. Light can also be turned on at any time and can be used as a night stand light. To snooze you just tab the top of the unit. No buttons to fumble with. While snoozing light stays on. Time display is dimmable and there is only one alarm setting. For the price, unit should have a back up battery in case there was a power failure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice glow to awaken by.
customer_reviews.text: It wakes me up in a non jarring manner without audio alarm. The audio is jarring however. Alarm and clock is NOT user friendly. Setting the time and alarm is confusing. Military time is default.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this didn't work for me. I will admit I have always struggled with waking up in the morning, so I had really high hopes for this alarm clock. The light makes no difference whatsoever. I don't even notice it gradually getting brighter. I always wake to it being fully illuminated and still end up snoozing for a half hour. Pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Functionally good, but it doesn’t feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This does a good job with the whole “simulated sunrise” thing. Good volume. However, I don’t like how there’s no actual snooze button - you just need to sort of smack (tap) the top of the unit to snooze. The whole thing feels a little plasticy and light-weight, so hitting it isn’t really a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: SlowComet

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lamp and alarm, a bit hard to program.
customer_reviews.text: I adore this lamp! It’s very sturdy and quite bright. The alarm sound is a little annoying, but it’s wonderful to wake up to the dawn simulation! The only drawback is that it’s a little hard to program. I taped the little instruction book to the back of the lamp to keep it handy.
customer_reviews.author: Machta

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only improvement I would make on this would be to produce a version that can be controlled from a smart phone. I love this light - it seems to really be helping me get up on time every morning! It wakes me up gently so that when my alarm DOES sound, I'm not startled out of a deep sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Woster

customer_reviews.title: Good light, inflexible clock and alarm sound.
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is pretty nice. The clock, not so much. The numbers on the clock display are SUPER BRIGHT and were distracting to my sleep. The "gentle beep" is not so gentle - it's electronic-sounding, and not what I was hoping for. If this clock had different sounds, and a display control for the numbers (or the ability to turn off the number display during sleep), that would be lovely. It was simple to set.
customer_reviews.author: mezzodiva
